privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.description: At Nomad Now, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our platform.

informationWeCollect.title: Information We Collect
informationWeCollect.description: We collect information to provide better services to all our users. The types of information we collect depend on how you use our services.

personalInfoItems.2: Location data (when you choose to share)

purposes.4: Respond to your inquiries and support requests

dataSharing.title: Data Sharing and Disclosure
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information to third parties. We may share your information only in the following circumstances:

circumstances.2: To protect our rights and safety
circumstances.3: With service providers who assist in operating our platform (under strict confidentiality agreements)

deadlines.title: Tax Deadline Reminder
deadlines.reminderTip1: Set calendar reminders 2-4 weeks before each deadline
deadlines.reminderTip2: Consider applying for extensions (US citizens automatically get 2-month extension)
deadlines.reminderTip3: Keep important documents organized throughout the year
deadlines.reminderTip4: Consult tax professionals for complex situations
deadlines.disclaimerText: This reminder system provides general tax deadline information. Actual deadlines may vary due to personal circumstances, extension applications, and other factors. Please refer to the latest information from official tax authorities and consult professional tax advisors for complex situations.
deadlines.selectCountryToView: Please select countries to view tax deadlines

nhrPortugal.title: Portugal NHR Program (2024 Update)
nhrPortugal.description: 10-year preferential tax rate, but policy has been significantly tightened, limited to high-skilled professions

territorialTax.title: Territorial Tax Strategy
territorialTax.description: Utilize territorial tax countries, foreign income tax-free, suitable for digital nomads

companyStructure.title: Company Structure Optimization
companyStructure.description: Optimize tax structure through offshore companies, suitable for high-income business owners

digitalNomadVisa.title: Digital Nomad Visa
digitalNomadVisa.description: Utilize specialized visas to optimize tax situation, simple and easy to implement

taxTreaty.title: Tax Treaty Optimization
taxTreaty.description: Utilize bilateral tax treaties to reduce double taxation

calculator.calculatorDisclaimer: This calculator provides estimates for reference only. Actual tax situations depend on individual circumstances, latest tax law changes, and country regulations. Please consult professional tax advisors before making any tax decisions.
calculator.residencyTrackingDesc: Monitor days spent in multiple countries to avoid triggering tax residency (usually 183 days)

feie.title: FEIE Eligibility Check
feie.reminder1: Must meet physical presence test (330 days) or bona fide residence test
feie.reminder2: Only applies to US federal income tax, not state taxes
feie.reminder3: Consult tax professionals to confirm eligibility
feie.reminder4: Actual savings depend on specific circumstances

residency.title: Tax Residency Tracking
residency.description: Monitor days spent in each country to avoid triggering tax residency (usually 183 days)
